Last Contact is an ongoing small web hopepunk sci-fi web novel. It takes place mostly in the 23rd and 24th century C.E. I've been working on various versions of this story since about 2005. It's to the point now where I have to stop drafting, rewriting, and editing myself into oblivion and just put it somewhere. The core idea for the story was a "what if" thought I had in 1994.

Further down this page there are a couple of sections to help navigate this web novel and site. There is a tutorial on how to read Last Contact. There is also a brief description of each of the sections of the web novel. For those of you that have been here before and just want a quick catch up there is a section of the last 10 changes.

How to Read Last Contact

The story of Last Contact can effectively be read in several different ways.

Book (Act) Order

Book order is designed to highlight specific themes throughout the story, but jumps back and forth though time. As you're reading follow the banners with the books.
Start with: Act 00 - Prologue: Dedication

Chronological Order

Reading the story in chronological order sequences the events in order by calendar, but can lose some of the larger themes. As you're reading follow the banners with the clocks.
Start with: Act 03 - Civil War: Projection

Publication Order

Publication order sequences the chapters in the order theyâ€™re written. Which jumps around both chronologically and thematically. This order is good for people that are keeping up to date with releases each week. As you're reading follow the banners with the hand holding a pen.
Start with: Act 00 - Prologue: Dedication

The Sections

  • Act 00 - Prologue: The prologue contains the beginning and the end of the stories of a particular set of characters.
  • Act 01 - The Pact: The Pact contains the story of humanity and the Crysix forming a pact for mutual goals.
  • Act 02 - Factions: Factions focuses on all the different factions in the universe and their motivations.
  • Act 03 - Civil War: A civil war between different factions in humanity, locked in a stalemate for a nearly a century continues to draw bloodshed.
  • Compendium: The compendium contains various supplementary information about the timeline, characters, and alien social structure.
  • Site News: This is where I'll put meta-ish news about the site.
  • Privacy Policy: This page speaks to the data the site collects from you (the reader) and your rights in regards to your privacy.
  • License & Terms: This page speaks to the legal license of the website and what you (the reader) can and cannot do with the site and content.
